articles.title: Pope Francis sends condolences to victims of deadly New York City fire - America Magazine
articles.description: The pope sent a telegram to New York Cardinal Timothy Dolan offering “heartfelt condolences and the assurance of his spiritual closeness” to those affected by the blaze, which killed at least 19 people, including nine children.
articles.content:
ROME (AP) Pope Francis offered his condolences Monday to the victims of the devastating apartment fire in the Bronx borough of New York that killed 19 people, nine of them children.

articles.author: John Wagner
articles.title: 'American Idol' star Clay Aiken making a second bid for Congress in North Carolina - The Washington Post
articles.description: Aiken is seeking the Democratic nomination in a redrawn district that includes much of the territory now represented by the retiring Rep. David Price (D-N.C.).
articles.content:
In 2014, Aiken prevailed in the Democratic primary in the states 2nd District but was soundly defeated in the general election by Republican incumbent Renee L. Ellmers.
